page.title: 19HOLIDAYS
page.content: Very often during the holidays, especially on Thursdays, the pony riders come up through part of the village and they go past the school. In the summer hikers come as well. The hikers stop at the pub for a drink and some crisps; they sit in the car-park on the benches. Bikers ride up to the pub too; they stop for a drink and some crisps. The lady who lives in the pub makes sandwiches for the bikers and the hikers. Caravanners stay at the Nursery Garden throughout the year. The site is better suited to static caravans rather than tourers.
